title: Memes of Boreas
intro: Welcome Mortals to another edition of Memes of Boreas! Your favorite set of adventures across the verse. The quest will last 3hour from now and everyone who wanna join would need to react with :fire: to this message. After doing so the Riddle bot will send you a DM with the first riddle. Good luck!

riddles.message: After leave the first location head to the south. You will find a X marking the spot between the piramids. Tell me mortal, how many treasure chest were hidden on the location

Is easy to count treasure chests! But lets go for something more challenging. I heard you like riddles. Tell me: What goes on four legs in the morning, two legs in the afternoon, and three legs in the evening
riddles.hint: Do u really ask a god for this?

riddles.message: You smarted than I thought! Find me at #1919 and claim your prize!
